Arcangel/Brooder/Sliverbolt




Arcangel starts to tell Ironraptor the plans.



Arcangel:




"What we will do is fix up the ark then put the engines from Brooders ship 
on the ark."


Brooder starts to talk


Brooder:


"but we will also go looking for the Autobots and put them in the ark when 
we launch it into space. It will stay in orbit till we bring it back down."


Sliverbolt:




"we will need all the maximals to find the autobots and get the engines from 
Brooders ship with the predcons and alliance members not knowing what we are 
doing."
